ACCOUNT_CREATOR_NOTICE1: The new account will start with nothing and will need some DTC to start transacting.
ACCOUNT_CREATOR_NOTICE2: Usernames must be between 3 and 50 characters long, and only contain alphanumeric lowercase characters. It may also contain hyphens (-) or full-stops (.) in between. Usernames may not be changed once created.
CHANNEL_TITLE_NO_VIDEOS: %s からのビデオがありません
CHANNEL_STEEM_DOLLARS_BALANCE: Steem ドル バランス :
CHANNEL_ACTIVITIES_BW_UPDATE: 帯域幅 アップデート :
CHANNEL_ACTIVITIES_VT_UPDATE: 投票 アップデート :
CHANNEL_KEYS_WARNING_SECURITY: Warning! You are currently logged in with your master key. It is safer to create a custom key with lesser permissions to use on a daily basis.
CHANNEL_KEYS_PARAGRAPH_INTRO: 暗号化キーはあなただけが知っています。 プライベートキーを紛失した場合、それを回復することは絶対できません。
CHANNEL_REWARDS_TITLE: あなたの DTC 報酬
CHANNEL_REWARDS_PARAGRAPH: DTC is created by real human people, sharing, voting, tagging and commenting videos on DTube. If you participate, you earn. On this page you can see a resume of all your votes and claim the associated DTC rewards. Votes can be claimed after 7 days. After a vote is claimed, it cannot earn curation rewards anymore.
DEFAULT_GATEWAY_OVERWRITE_INFO: Define a gateway to be used on initial video load. Defaults to player.d.tube if left blank.
EDIT_ERROR_INVALID_VIDEOHASH: Source video hash is not a valid hash
ELECTION_PARAGRAPH: DTube is a self-governed platform, where a limited number of leaders (currently 10) are elected and are in charge of producing new blocks and securing the infrastructure. You can vote for them on this page. You can vote for up to 5 leaders.
ELECTION_TITLE: DTubeのリーダーを選出する
ERC20_SWAP_TEXT: Moving DTube Coins to/from Ethereum might take a few minutes. Transactions are irreversible, please make sure the sender and receiver are correct before confirming.
ERROR_PAGE_NOT_FOUND: ページが見つかりません！
GLOBAL_ERROR_COULD_NOT_VOTE: 投票できませんでした
GLOBAL_ERROR_RESTEEMED: あなたは尊敬しました %1

GLOBAL_UNVOTE_LEADER: リーダー ％1 の投票を取り消しました

LOGIN_ERROR_UNKNOWN_USERNAME: ユーザー名が存在しません。

MASTER_KEY_CHANGE_CONFIRM_ONE: I understand that this operation is irreversible once processed.
MASTER_KEY_CHANGE_CONFIRM_TWO: I have stored my new master private key in a safe place.
MISSING_PERMISSIONS_BODY: You are logged in with a custom key that does not have the permission to perform this transaction. To proceed, please enter another custom key that has %1 permission or your master key. The key that you have entered below will only be used to broadcast this transaction.
NO_BANDWIDTH_3: With your current balance of %1, you need to wait
NO_BANDWIDTH_4: Keep more DTC in your account to have more bandwidth power. 1 DTC generates +10 bytes / hour.
NOTIFICATION_NOT_VOTING_LEADERS: You are currently not voting for leaders. Go to the election page.
NOTIFICATION_ELIGIBLE_TO_AIRDROP: You are eligible to the DTube Coin airdrop. Click here to claim %1.

TOPBAR_DTC_EXPLAIN: DTUBE Coins - Hold more of it to generate more Voting Power. You can burn it to promote your videos and comments.
TOPBAR_VT_EXPLAIN: Voting Power - あなたのアカウントと紐付いており、投票することや新たなコンテンツを追加するときに利用できます。あなたのDTCをより強力かつネットワークに拡散させることができます。
